name: Sequin - Colors by Number
description:
Sequin Simulator - Colors by Number

Draw by Number - Real Sequins!

Welcome to the unique application Sequin Simulator - Colors by Number. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of coloring sequins by numbers and numbers. Coloring by numbers is the best anti-stress, like slime, slim or squish.
Color the image by numbers and turn it over like a real sequin.
In the game you will collect by image numbers: people, animals, fruits, flowers, monsters, objects, a dog, a cat and much more!
You always have the opportunity to take a magic hint, to help in collecting images. After collecting the picture, set the color of the back of the shirt to your taste. Swipe your finger across the screen and rotate the sequins to relax your nerves :) Coloring game will make your day happy and interesting.
It is always interesting to play with sequins, after collecting them by numbers. Stretch, knead, slam, rotate a lot of action! The real sound of the rotation of the super sequins is super anti-stress. Use an emulator of real sequins at any time, even when there is no Internet.
The app best pictures coloring by numbers completely free, we do not require a subscription from you.
Create your own unique pattern from sequins by numbers now!
